creator: masque@inetsolve.com
text: The documentation for the jk2 connector has an error. It should be lb_factor, not lbfactor. --- configwebcom.xml -r1.9 2004-02-04 15:47:17.000000000 -0500 +++ configwebcom.xml 2004-02-04 15:22:18.000000000 -0500 @@ -295,7 +295,7 @@ Tomcat Engine must be set with jvmRoute= ? - lbfactor + lb_factor 1 Load balancing factor to use. At this moment, it'll be set on the worker, @@ -360,7 +360,7 @@ Tomcat Engine must be set with jvmRoute= If set to 1 Disables the Nagle algorithm for send coalescing - lbfactor + lb_factor 1 Load balancing factor to use. At this moment, it'll be set on the worker,

creator: masque@inetsolve.com
text:
Forgot to mention, check here for confirmation:
http://cvs.apache.org/viewcvs.cgi/jakarta-tomcat-connectors/jk/native2/common/Attic/jk_channel_socket.c?rev=1.41&only_with_tag=JK2_2_0_0_rel&view=auto
